title-group.article-title: ON INTERPOLATION BY PLANAR CUBIC G² PYTHAGOREAN-HODOGRAPH SPLINE CURVES

abstract.p: In this paper, the geometric interpolation of planar data points and boundary tangent directions by a cubic G² Pythagorean-hodograph (PH) spline curve is studied. It is shown that such an interpolant exists under some natural assumptions on the data. The construction of the spline is based upon the solution of a tridiagonal system of nonlinear equations. The asymptotic approximation order 4 is confirmed.
